title: Video Editor (Must Have Ecommerce Experience - 30h p/w)
job_overview:
First, please answer this IQ-question: What is 10 - 2?

You'll be editing short-form and long-form ad creatives for Facebook only, designed to stop the scroll, hook attention fast, and convert cold traffic into buyers.

This role is not for a task-taker. We want someone who:

• Thinks critically about what makes a video convert
• Reads Meta Ads Manager data and adjusts accordingly (CTR, Hook Hold, CTR, CVR, ROAS)
• Wants to grow with the brand and help shape its creative direction

You MUST have experience with:

• Use ElevenLabs (voice-over)
• Create AI Avatar (ARC ads style / Creatify / Heygen)
• Understanding the Facebook ad matrix / statistics and knowing what to improve based on metrics.
• Can help with writing / optimizing the scrips partly (based on ad data of previous tests)

To apply: Please answer the IQ-question with: “17”
(Yes, we know this is not the correct answer, but it proves you're not a bot and that you can follow instructions) + expected salary in USD per HOUR - could become full time so we would pay for month after.

Excited? Apply now and include your portfolio
